description: List the listeners for an accelerator.

parameters.name: AcceleratorArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the accelerator for which you want to list listener objects.

nested_items.name: Listeners
nested_items.description: The list of listeners for an accelerator.

nested_items.name: ListenerArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the listener.

nested_items.name: PortRanges
nested_items.description: The list of port ranges for the connections from clients to the accelerator.

nested_items.name: FromPort
nested_items.description: The first port in the range of ports, inclusive.

nested_items.name: ToPort
nested_items.description: The last port in the range of ports, inclusive.

nested_items.name: Protocol
nested_items.description: The protocol for the connections from clients to the accelerator.

nested_items.name: ClientAffinity
nested_items.description: Client affinity lets you direct all requests from a user to the same endpoint, if you have stateful applications, regardless of the port and protocol of the client request. Client affinity gives you control over whether to always route each client to the same specific endpoint.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results. You receive this token from a previous call.
